abilities.description: Emits purple beams of Noroma Photons that slow down anything they hit for exactly thirty seconds.
limitations: Can be reflected by mirrors or reflective surfaces
Affects the user if they are exposed to their own beams

abilities.description: When a target is struck while slowed, the kinetic force of all attacks is released at once when they return to normal speed, making attacks more damaging.

keyMoments.title: Noro Noro Beam Reflected by Mirror
keyMoments.description: Luffy discovers that the Noro Noro Beam can be reflected using a mirror, turning Foxy's own power against him.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals a critical weakness of the fruit's abilities and demonstrates that Devil Fruit powers can be countered with clever tactics.

reveals.information: The Noro Noro Beam can be reflected by mirrors or reflective surfaces

abilities.description: Luffy swings one arm in a circle at high speed, then drives his fist into his opponent with accumulated rotational force.

keyMoments.title: Gomu Gomu no Flail Debut
keyMoments.description: Luffy debuts the Gomu Gomu no Flail technique against Foxy, using it as the finishing blow in their battle.
keyMoments.significance: Expands Luffy's combat repertoire with a new rotational attack technique.

reveals.information: New technique: Gomu Gomu no Flail
